TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateGroup extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"> objects representing the template elements in a Web server control at design time.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a control designer class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class. This control designer supports a control with four possible templates.
To try it, compile the code, and then, in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](../../add/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], look at the page in Design view. Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template.
[!CODE [DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1)] [!CODE [DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string groupName) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"> class, using the provided name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string groupName, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style groupStyle) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object to be applied to templates in the group.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"> class, using the provided name and style.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddTemplateDefinition(class System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition templateDefinition) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"> to the group.
Gets the name of the group.
Gets the current style for the group.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> for the group if set; otherwise, `null`.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there are any templates in the group.
Docs.value: `true` if there are no templates in the group; otherwise `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets an array of all template definitions in the group.
